citeinfo.origin: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation
citeinfo.title: RECREATIONAL_FACILITIES_IDNR_IN: Outdoor Recreational Facilities in Indiana (Indiana Department of Natural Resources, 1:24,000, Point Shapefile)

pubinfo.publish: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

descript.abstract:
NOTE: The original data set named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OR.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological Survey personnel on August 14, 2003, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. Also, portions of this metadata were originally authored by Michael P. Martin.
NOTE: An updated data set named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OR.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological Survey personnel on December 8, 2003, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation.
NOTE: An updated data set named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OR.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological Survey personnel on December 16, 2003, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation.
NOTE: An updated data set named RECFACILITIES_OPENPUBLICORNONPRIVATE_DNR_OR.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological Survey personnel on March 14, 2006, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set. Also, portions of this metadata were originally authored by Michael P. Martin.
NOTE: An updated data set named RECFACILITIES_OPENPUBLICORNONPRIVATE_DNR_OR.SHP was provided to Indiana Geological Survey personnel on February 26, 2009, by Mr. Michael P. Martin, GIS Coordinator, Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation. This metadata is intended to accompany the updated data set. Also, portions of this metadata were originally authored by Michael P. Martin.
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP:
"This dataset contains point locations of sites in Indiana that have outdoor recreation facilities. It includes facilities managed by federal, state, and local governments, as well as non-government organizations, private and commercial entities, and schools. It does not include sites that are private and not open to the public."
descript.purpose:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP:
"This dataset was developed for the purpose of aiding outdoor recreation planners and providers. It is a critical component in the development of the Indiana Statewide Comprehensive Outdoor Recreation Plan (SCORP)."

theme.themekey: Indiana Statewide Comprehensive Outdoor Recreation Plan (SCORP)

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.0 (Build 6001) Service Pack 1; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850, Approximately 17.9 Mb

attracc.attraccr:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP:
"Attribute information was provided by division staff working with the site's managing entity."

dataqual.logic:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP:
"This data set is a point shapefile. There is no topology."
dataqual.complete:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP:
"This data set only includes identified sites which were found during the inventory process."

horizpa.horizpar:
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDNR, Division of Outdoor Recreation, for the source shapefile named RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP:
"The vast majority of site locations were acquired using GIS mapping-grade GPS data collectors; the majority of the data were not processed for differential correction. A few site locations were acquired by digitizing from USGS 1:24,000 topographic quadrangle maps."

citeinfo.origin: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation, SCORP Section
citeinfo.title: Outdoor Recreational Facilities in Indiana

pubinfo.publish: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

srcinfo.srccontr: This point shapefile provides locations of outdoor recreational facilities in Indiana.

procstep.procdesc: Utilized previous state outdoor recreation surveys dating back as far as 1975 to identify recreation sites.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation, SCORP Section

procstep.procdesc: Conducted mail survey to update acreage and property holdings information for public recreation agencies and schools.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation, SCORP Section

procstep.procdesc: Contacted user groups and conducted a mail survey to inventory non-profit, commercial, and private recreation facilities.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation, SCORP Section

procstep.procdesc: Visited sites to collect attribute information and geolocate using mapping grade GPS datacollectors.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation, SCORP Section

procstep.procdesc: Completed survey forms for each site and entering attribute information into FileMaker Pro database; converted FileMaker Pro database to Microsoft Access database.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation, SCORP Section

procstep.procdesc: Created point shapefile of sites by downloading data from GPS collector; using ARC/INFO generate, projectdefine, and project commands.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Added points as needed by collecting data on GIS mapping grade GPS datacollector, post-processing for differential correction, exporting as ArcView shapefile in correct coordinate system, and merging with previous shapefile.

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Added some points by digitizing from 1:24000 USGS topographic quadrangle maps. Other points collected via GPS (Trimble GeoExplorer II or GeoExplorer 3; points were differentially corrected when possilbe).

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

procstep.procdesc: Points joined to FacInv4 database, qryFacilitiesTrailsWater; exported data as shapefile.
Filtered out sites that are private and not open to the public: Selected sites where private = -1 and open to the public = 0, reversed the selection and exported as shapefile.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled RECFACILITIES_DNR_OR from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on December 16, 2003 as an attachment to an electronic mail message.
RECFACILITIES_DNR_OR is a point shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. RECFACILITIES_DNR_OR was then checked in ESRI ArcMap 8.3 to ensure that all data points fell within the Indiana state boundary, INCLP83 (which contains the area within the 92 county boundaries for the state of Indiana, compiled at a scale of 1:24,000). The file was then renamed RECREATIONAL_FACILITIES_IDNR_IN to conform to internal IGS naming standards.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled RECFACILITIES_OPENPUBLICORNONPRIVATE_DNR_OR from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on March 14, 2006 as an attachment to an electronic mail message.
RECFACILITIES_OPENPUBLICORNONPRIVATE_DNR_OR is a point shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. RECFACILITIES_OPENPUBLICORNONPRIVATE_DNR_OR was then checked in ESRI ArcGIS 9.1 to ensure that all data points fell within the Indiana state boundary, INCLP83 (which contains the area within the 92 county boundaries for the state of Indiana, compiled at a scale of 1:24,000). The attribute fields titled "LOCSOURCE" and "COUNTYLU" were deleted from the attribute table. The file was then renamed RECREATIONAL_FACILITIES_IDNR_IN to conform to internal IGS naming standards.

Personnel of the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) received an updated shapefile titled RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP from Michael P. Martin (IDNR, DOR) on February 26, 2009 as an attachment to an electronic mail message.
RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP is a point shapefile, in UTM zone 16, NAD83 coordinates. RECFACILITIES_DNR_OUTREC_IN_081209.SHP was then checked in ESRI ArcGIS 9.3 to ensure that all data points fell within the Indiana state boundary. The attribute fields titled "LOCSOURCE," "SITECODE_1," and "COUNTYLU" were deleted from the attribute table. The file was then renamed RECREATIONAL_FACILITIES_IDNR_IN.SHP to conform to internal IGS naming standards.

This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit v 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser v 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (United States Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

cntorgp.cntorg: Indiana Department of Natural Resources, Division of Outdoor Recreation

distinfo.distliab:
CREDIT
It is requested that the Indiana Geological Survey be cited in any products generated from this data. The following source citation should be included: RECREATIONAL_FACILITIES_IDNR_IN: Outdoor Recreational Facilities in Indiana (Indiana Department of Natural Resources, 1:24,000, Point Shapefile).
WARRANTY
Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405-2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.
LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
